title: AFC West Training Camp Burning Questions: How much better did the Chiefs get? Are Broncos quarterbacks good enough? (Football 7/23)
description:
Nominate Pick Six for The People's Choice Podcast Awards: https://www.podcastawards.com/app/signup/

Our division-by-division look at burning Training Camp questions concludes with the AFC West. The Chiefs solidified their offensive line but the defense still makes us ever-so-slightly second-guess KC. We're very curious how Brandon Staley performs as the 1st-year coach of the the Chargers and if the Broncos QBs are good enough if they don't end up acquiring a big-name talent. And can the Raiders get more contributions from recent draft picks? Will Brinson and Ryan Wilson address all that and more on this episode!

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Read the Pick Six newsletter here: https://www.cbssports.com/newsletters/picksix/
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
